hero.title: Ricardo Sequeira
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer
hero.description: With over 5 years of experience in developing scalable cloud-based solutions, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality, innovative software for impactful projects. Explore my work and see how I can contribute to your team's success.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate software engineer who loves building elegant and efficient solutions.
paragraphs: Hi there! üëã I'm Ricardo Sequeira, a passionate software engineer with a solid foundation in computer science. I studied at one of the top engineering universities in Lisbon, Portugal, where I earned my master's degree üéì. After completing my studies, I spent several years in the industry, gaining valuable experience working on a range of projects.

Beyond coding, I believe in the power of learning by doing. I love exploring new challenges not only in programming but also in other creative endeavors. From gardening üå± and making sourdough bread üçû to woodworking ü™ö and cooking üç≥, I find joy in balancing the mental work of coding with hands-on, tactile creativity. I also have a deep love for the outdoors and hiking, which allows me to connect with nature and recharge my spirit.

Traveling and experiencing new cultures are also big parts of my life üåç. In 2024, I took a sabbatical year, which took me through Europe, Iceland, Canada, and the USA. During this time, I worked in various seasonal jobs that not only made the journey financially possible but also helped me develop valuable soft skills, such as communication, adaptability, and resilience.

What drives me in software development is the constant challenge it presents. It's an industry where continuous learning is key to staying up-to-date and evolving with new technologies üíª. I also enjoy building strong relationships with clients, listening to their feedback, and working together to create solutions that truly meet their needs. This client-focused approach is one of the most rewarding aspects of my work.

Currently, I'm looking to take the next step in my career by seeking international experience. My girlfriend and I are planning to relocate to the Netherlands for new opportunities and adventures üá≥üá±. I'm excited to immerse myself in a new environment, grow professionally, and contribute to innovative projects in the global tech community.

careerTimeline.title: Freelance Software Engineer
careerTimeline.description: Focused on building my own projects and gaining experience in different areas of software development.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.details: A personal portfolio website built with React, Tailwind CSS, HTML, and CSS.

projects.name: Hmmm
projects.details: A takeaway app developed independently using Flutter and Firebase, already released on the App Store.

careerTimeline.title: Sabbatical Year
careerTimeline.description: Traveled through Italy, Iceland, Canada, and the US, combining seasonal work with cultural immersion and gaining soft skills in diverse, international settings.

careerTimeline.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
careerTimeline.description: Developed four large-scale, cloud-based products, built mobile apps using Flutter and web platforms with Vue.js, led a team of six engineers in a contract management system, and worked with Go, Kotlin, MongoDB, MySQL, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.

projects.name: Companion App for EV Vehicles
projects.details: A core mobile application for the next generation of electric vehicles for Germany's largest car manufacturer. Built with Flutter for seamless cross-platform performance.

projects.name: Video-On-Demand & Networking Platform
projects.details: A mobile app providing users with on-demand video streaming and networking capabilities. Ensured optimal UX/UI and smooth performance using Flutter.

projects.name: Omnichannel E-Commerce Platform
projects.details: Developed a cloud-native online shop for Germany's third-largest fashion retailer. Worked on both frontend (Vue.js) and backend (Go, Kotlin).

projects.name: Contract Management Back Office
projects.details: Led a team of six engineers to develop a contract management system for the world's fourth-largest retailer, focusing on architecture, scalability, and performance.

careerTimeline.title: Master of Science in Computer Science and Engineering
Junior Consultant
careerTimeline.description: Developed PL/SQL and Oracle Forms & Reports, and worked on an Oracle database platform project.

careerTimeline.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Engineering
careerTimeline.description: Academic Merit Diploma 2014, Academic Excellence Diploma 2015 & 2016

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Feeling curious about my work? Feel free to reach me out!
